verbose_text: Several active constituents of Glycyrrhiza spp., including flavanones, chalcones, isoflavans, flavones, and isoflavones, have been shown to inhibit NF-kappaB activation in various cell types [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: spp., including flavanones, chalcones, isoflavans, flavones, and isoflavones, have been shown to inhibit NF-kappaB
